title: Profiles in Innovation at Northeastern University: Colin Ang
description: Colin Angle and his team transformed the robot from factory drone to a member of the family—domestic and military—with the award-winning Roomba floor-vacuuming robot and the PackBot search and bomb-disposal robot. On November 3rd, 2011, President Aoun and

asset.author: iRobot
asset.hookText: Colin Angle and his team transformed the robot from factory drone to a member of the family—domestic and military—with the award-winning Roomba floor-vacuuming robot and the PackBot search and bomb-disposal robot. On November 3rd, 2011, President Aoun and iRobot's visionary CEO and cofounder discussed the challenges of entrepreneurship, the possibilities for the next generation of robots, and whether there could someday be a rise of the machines.
